main.name: Shoaib Sheikh
main.description: I have an Active Top Secret Clearance and possess strong analytical skills. I am dedicated to producing clean, testable, and maintainable code, and take pride in my profession. Additionally, I am committed to staying current with new technologies and industry best practices through ongoing education and training.
main.bio: As a software engineer with over 10 years of experience, I have a proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions for both defence and public sector organizations. With a top secret clearance and extensive experience working with sensitive information, I am well-equipped to handle projects that require a high level of confidentiality and security. I have expertise in full stack technologies, including Springboot, React, and various databases, as well as experience working with AWS cloud. I am also a strong proponent of open source contributions, and have actively participated in various open source projects throughout my career. I am a highly motivated and proactive team player, with a passion for continuously learning and staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and best practices. Thank you for considering my profile. I look forward to connecting with you and discussing potential opportunities to work together.
main.contactmessage: If you are interested in knowing more about the kind of work that excited me the most, please don't hesitate to contact me.

resume.skillmessage: I have a wide variety of skills, here are some of the highlights.

education.description: Some of the highlights of FIU's Undergraduate Coursework includes Operating Systems, Databases, Algorithms, Programming Languages, Data mining, Computer Architecture and Software Engineering.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Working as a Lead Software Engineer, supporting various mission critical applications for U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP).

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Worked as a Senior Software Engineer, supporting sensitive and open source projects for high profile customers like US Airforce and Veteran Affairs.

work.title: Senior Software Engineer
work.description: Worked as a Software Engineer in an Agile XP environment, leveraging TDD, Pair programming and UCD to support various KesselRun Teams to meet mission-critical goals of US Air force. My tech Stack at KesselRun includes: Java, Javascript, React, Redux, SpringBoot, MariaDB, Pivotal Cloud Foundry, Pivotal Concourse, Docker, Fortify, ThreadFix and Gitlab.

work.title: Systems Engineer II
work.description: Worked as Radar Systems Engineer in support of Raytheon’s PMO. My tech Stack at Raytheon included: C#, VBA, MySQL, Data mining, DOORS, EAGLE, CLEARCASE, SLICWAVE, POWERLOG, WindChill and SAP Prism.

work.title: Systems Engineer
work.description: Worked as an Aviation Software Systems Engineer to support company’s aircraft maintenance system. My tech Stack at Amerijet included: AngularJs, Javascript, HTML, CSS, Ionic, VBA and MySQL.
